You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Shipment Fields

The Shipment object represents a shipment of order items. It’s associated with one fulfillment order.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Shipment object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Actual Delivery Date	The date that the product was delivered.
Created By	The user who created the shipment record.
Created Date	The date that the shipment record was created.
Deliver To	The person or entity that the product was delivered to.
Delivery Method	The delivery method used for the shipment.
Description	The description of the shipment.
Destination Location	The location where the product is to be delivered.
Expected Delivery Date	The date that the product is expected to be delivered.
Fulfillment Order	The fulfillment order that the shipment belongs to.
Last Modified By	The user who last changed the shipment record.
Last Modified Date	The date that the shipment record was last changed.
Order Summary	The order summary associated with the shipment.
Owner Name	The owner of the shipment.
Return Order	For a return shipment, the associated return order.
Ship From Address	The physical address that the product is shipping from
Ship To Address	The physical address where the product is delivered.
Ship To Name	The name of the shipment recipient.
Shipment Number	The unique identification number for the shipment.
Shipping Provider	The name of the company or person making the delivery.
Source Location	The field service location where the shipment originates.
Status	

The status of the shipment.

Possible values are:

Shipped—The product is in transit.
Delivered—The product is at the source location.

You can customize the status values to represent your business processes.


Total Items Quantity	The total quantity of items included in the shipment. This value is calculated as the sum of the quantities of the shipment items in the shipment.
Tracking Number	The tracking number for the shipment.
Tracking URL	The URL of the website used to track the shipment.

title: Understanding Shipment Fields in Salesforce Order Management
